channel.title: Idea and still got problems, all npc problems
channel.description:
Well first, has ne one tried making fire cape work? like it rs2 it moves, in private servers it is motionless.
On my server, When anyone attacks jad, they hit a 0 and he dies, if i am anywere near him,then i freez and get booted off, no1else does though, and if i try to attack him i get booted off b4 i even get near him, and others see me kill him with a 0, and he has hp in the npc file. My other problem is that if i change the npc.cfg file, it doesnt affect the npcs at all.

item.title: Idea and still got problems, all npc problems
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

i like servers that are more like real rs, u know any others besides testscape? i checked out cheezscape but i get like 200 erros when i try to compile

Read full topic
